Data: Australia have won the toss and have opted to field
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run beauty! Shapes away to beat the left-hander as he tries to drive on the up
Starc to Mohammad Naim, SIX runs incredible pick-up shot over midwicket! Length on the pads, Naim whips that away nonchalantly
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run nips back in to beat the inside edge to hit the pad, a tad high though
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run dabs it to the point region
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run short outside off, there for the cut but Naim lets it go
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run play and a miss! Loose drive, no feet. Lovely away-swinger
Hazlewood to Soumya, 1 wide loose delivery down leg, wide called. Bit of zip though to the keeper
Hazlewood to Soumya, no run shapes away off a length to beat the edge
Hazlewood to Soumya, no run thuds into the bat as he dabs it gently behind the wicket. Was looking to glide this down to third man
Hazlewood to Soumya, no run goes for a big mow across the line, beaten!
Hazlewood to Soumya, 1 run chopped down to third man off the bottom edge
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, no run driven straight to cover point
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, 1 run nearly chopped on! Rolls past leg stump to the keeper for a streaky single
Zampa to Mohammad Naim, no run pushed back to the bowler
Zampa to Mohammad Naim, no run jams it back to the bowler, too much flight that time. Got too close to the pitch
Zampa to Mohammad Naim, 1 run eased with the spin to long-on
Zampa to Soumya, no run wrong'un on leg-stump, covers the line and defends
Zampa to Soumya, 1 run swept straight to short fine. Looks like he was trying to whack that square
Zampa to Mohammad Naim, FOUR runs picks the short ball and the short square boundary on the leg side through the pull shot
Hazlewood to Soumya, no run keeps low as it thuds into the pad. Was looking to pull but through with the stroke even before the ball arrived
Hazlewood to Soumya, no run sways out of the way of this short ball. Was initially trying to upper cut

Hazlewood to Soumya, OUT chopped on! Made room to cut, Hazlewood follows him to cramp him for room, so Soumya tries to run it down to third man but ends up smashing the middle stump as he opens the bat face to steer
Hazlewood to Shakib, 3 runs whips it delightfully into the gap between mid-on and midwicket
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, 1 run runs it down to third man
Hazlewood to Shakib, no run hit high on the thigh pad as he tries to work it to the leg side
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run uppish, just wide of midwicket
Starc to Mohammad Naim, SIX runs in the slot and boom! Half-volley angling in, Naim holds his shape and flicks it off his pads to clear deep midwicket comfortably
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run shortens his length a touch, there's extra bounce that time as Naim dabs it to the off side. Good comeback
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run mistimes this to mid-off. Was looking to flay that on the up
Starc to Mohammad Naim, 1 run full on the stumps, tails away late, squeezed back down towards mid-on
Starc to Shakib, no run zippy bouncer on middle and leg, too quick for Shakib, he ducks under it
Tye to Mohammad Naim, no run full outside off. Checks the drive, and goes to cover
Tye to Mohammad Naim, no run length ball on leg and angling towards middle and off. Stays on the back foot and tries to cut it behind point. But stopped by short third
Tye to Mohammad Naim, FOUR runs short ball, on leg, but Tye doesn't have Starc's pace. Stands tall, this young man, and swivels to pull confidently over square leg for four
Tye to Mohammad Naim, 2 runs full, outside leg, on his toes. Flicked to deep backward square for one. This was in the slot to go for another boundary had he used his wrists to place it even finer
Tye to Mohammad Naim, no run good length, on middle. Angling across. Naim drops his hands and sways away from the ball's line
Tye to Mohammad Naim, 1 run good length, outside off. Cut to deep point and that's the powerplay done and dusted
Zampa to Mohammad Naim, no run tossed up, just outside off. Dug away to cover
Zampa to Mohammad Naim, 1 run full on middle. Wants to drive, but takes the edge to short third man. Turner dives in that region to stop it. Googly this was
Zampa to Shakib, 1 run full, just outside off. Clattered off the front foot to wide long off
Zampa to Mohammad Naim, 2 runs full on middle. Presses forward, closes the bat's face, and guides it to the vacant region at deep mid wicket. Nice, early call for two
Zampa to Mohammad Naim, no run full on middle and off. Fended back to Zampa

Zampa to Mohammad Naim, OUT what a way to get out! Premeditates to play the reverse sweep, Zampa goes absolutely full on middle stump. Misses the shot, ball goes under the bat, and the stumps have been broken. A promising innings over with a shot he'd like to forget
Agar to Shakib, 1 leg bye full on leg, and turning in. Shakib comes down the wicket to flick. Misses, hits the pad and rolls away to the off side
Agar to Mahmudullah, 1 run full, around the stumps, just outside off. Tap and run off the front foot to the off side
Agar to Shakib, 1 run full on middle, and leg. Flicked with the turn to deep square leg, where there's ample protection
Agar to Mahmudullah, no run full ball nudged away to backward point
Agar to Mahmudullah, 1 run full on off, and guided to the gap at midwicket for one. Nobody there so Agar has to give the ball a chase himself
Agar to Shakib, no run good length on middle. Rocks back and punches it to the bowler
Zampa to Mahmudullah, 1 run tossed up, ends up as a full toss as Mahmudullah comes forward. Swiped to deep midwicket
Zampa to Shakib, FOUR runs up and over! Full on leg. Clears the front leg, and swats it over Zampa. Fielder at long on very wide, while the shot was straight
Zampa to Shakib, FOUR runs lucky! Full on off, and the googly is turning away. Tries the expansive drive, but takes the edge past the keeper. Zampa thought that could've been caught
Zampa to Shakib, 1 run Shakib isn't taking chances with the spinning ball now. Gets down to sweep this full ball to deep midwicket
Zampa to Mahmudullah, 1 run good length, just outside off. Guided to point for a single
Zampa to Shakib, no run full outside off, and the googly is driven along the ground to cover
Agar to Mahmudullah, no run good length, outside off. Makes room, cuts square, but not past the infield
Agar to Mahmudullah, 1 run full on off. Presses forward, defends with soft hands to the off side
Agar to Shakib, 1 run sees Shakib coming down the track, and bowls a short ball outside off. But the batter somehow gets some bat to cut it to deep point

Agar to Mahmudullah, 2 runs dropped! At first slip by Turner. Full outside off, and he slashes a drive. Takes the edge, past the keeper's pad and to Turner's left. Gets a hand to it, but it pops out. Tough chance, but good luck telling a bowler that
Agar to Mahmudullah, 1 run full on off, and pushed to midwicket
Agar to Shakib, 1 run full on off stump. Driven to long on, and he'll keep strike. Bangladesh run-rate under 6 after 10 overs
Tye to Shakib, 1 run good length, outside off and angling away. Slaps it to deep point for one

Tye to Mahmudullah, no run fullish, outside off. Slows it down. Mahmudullah gets towards the line of the ball to play the late cut to third man. But deceived by the lack of pace. Through to Wade on the bounce
Tye to Mahmudullah, no run full outside off, and he checks a drive. Hits the bat and goes to cover. A knuckleball, the replays confirm
Tye to Mahmudullah, 1 run fullish, outside off. Worked to third man for one
Tye to Shakib, 1 run back of a length, on off. Drags a pull from outside off to deep midwicket
Tye to Mahmudullah, no run back of a length, just outside off. Can't connect with the pull

Agar to Shakib, 1 run time to accelerate? Full on middle, and he comes down the ground to hit it over the bowler. Ends up hitting it straight back, and Agar sticks his right hand out in front of the umpire. Parried away towards mid off

Agar to Mahmudullah, no run stumped? This was an uncharacteristically late stumping from an international quality keeper. Full outside off, and turning away as he tries to drive. Misses after stretching forward. And Wade grabs the ball, then keeps an eye on the batter's feet. Notices Mahmudullah is slow to drag his boot back over he line, and whips it off. But replays show Mahmudullah managed to
Agar to Mahmudullah, no run full outside off. Turning away. Mahmudullah looks to sweep, but goes under the bat. Goes over the tramlines, but a fair ball since the batter had moved to the off side
Agar to Mahmudullah, 2 runs full outside off stump. Dragged against the turn to wide long on for a single
Agar to Mahmudullah, 2 runs full on off. Makes room by backing away and looks to go over cover for four. Sliced slightly, goes over the infield, and a couple more
Agar to Mahmudullah, 1 run good length on off. Comes down the ground to nudge it leg side. But misses. Hits the pad, and goes to the off side for one. Lbw appeal turned down
Hazlewood to Mahmudullah, SIX runs here we go! Length ball angling in. Stays deep in his crease, and swipes a shot off his hips to deep backward square for six

Hazlewood to Mahmudullah, OUT Henriques, you beauty! And that's Hazlewood's second. Knuckle ball, full on middle. Comes down the ground to clear long off, but through the shot too early. Ball's going over mid off (Henriques) but he runs back, tracks the ball over his left shoulder, and then dives to take a catch
Hazlewood to Shakib, 1 run good length, on middle. Chops a shot to third man. Throws at the bowler's end thinking he can get a run out. Nobody backing up, and that's one overthrow run
Hazlewood to Nurul, no run full on off. Tries to tap and run to cover to get off the mark. But the fielder runs in, attacking the ball, forcing Nurul to turn and get back inside
Hazlewood to Nurul, 1 run good length, just outside off. Checks a pull to deep midwicket
Hazlewood to Shakib, 1 run good length, on middle and leg. Too close for the cut. Ends up chopping it down to third man
Zampa to Shakib, 2 runs full on middle. Clears the front leg, and hammers it down to long on
Zampa to Shakib, no run full on middle. Turning in. Looks to flick it leg side. Leading edge towards the off side
Zampa to Shakib, no run fullish, on middle. Turning in. Nudged to the leg side, but it hits his boot

Zampa to Shakib, FOUR runs full on off. Comes down the ground, and drags a shot to long on. Fielder runs in, dives forward to take the catch, but it falls just in front of him. To make matters worse, it's gone through Tye, and he has to run back to the boundary to stop the four. Fails to do that.
Zampa to Shakib, no run length ball on off. Turning in. Cut to point
Zampa to Shakib, 1 run googly to end his spell. Length ball on off. Turning away. Flat-batted to long on for one
Tye to Shakib, 1 run full and wide outside off. But Shakib follows that line, getting close to the pitch of the ball. Smacked to long off
Tye to Nurul, 2 runs back of a length, outside off. Backs away and slaps a cut in front of square to deep extra cover

Tye to Nurul, OUT overpitched, very wide outside off, knuckleball. But he walks towards the off side and try and slice a shot over point. Mistimed, point (Marsh) runs back but keeps his eyes on the ball. Takes it from near his face and goes tumbling backwards.

Tye to Shakib, 1 run full and wide outside off. Throws his hands at this, and slaps it uppishly to deep cover. Carey runs in to take a catch, but he's late to react, running towards cover instead of coming in. Changes direction late, and the ball falls in front of him
Tye to Afif, 1 run length ball outside leg. Bends, and looks to paddle a shot to fine leg. Ends up mistiming to deep backward square
Tye to Shakib, 1 run good length, on middle and angling across. Drags a shot to deep midwicket
Agar to Shakib, 1 run mistimes a heave into the leg side. Agar fired it away from Shakib's arc
Agar to Afif, 2 runs drilled through extra cover, wide long-off runs around the ropes to cut that off
Agar to Afif, 1 run dabs it to short third
Agar to Shakib, 1 run goes length, slapped past the bowler to long-off. Good work by Starc
Agar to Afif, 1 run squeezed behind point
Agar to Shakib, 1 run drilled past the bowler, long-off comes around to cut that off
Hazlewood to Shakib, 1 run a direct hit at the bowler's end would've had Shakib. Hit it straight to cover and took off. Phillippe with the throw. Shakib had given up
Hazlewood to Afif, 1 run muscles this down to long-on
Hazlewood to Shakib, 1 run mistimes this heave to deep midwicket
Hazlewood to Afif, FOUR runs clobbered! Cleared his front leg, got underneath the length and drilled it to beat long-on, one bounce to the fence
Hazlewood to Afif, 1 run tucks this to the man coming in from deep square
Hazlewood to Shakib, OUT dragged on! Shakib deceived by the slower one, looks to slam this across the line but can only get a thick inside edge onto the stumps
Starc to Afif, FOUR runs lofted over the covers, proper cricketing hit. Didn't try top muscle, all timing. It was a slower ball and he picked it up, held his shape and put that away
Starc to Afif, no run top delivery! Follows him and delivers a ripper of a yorker, dug back. Starc runs across and underarm flicks, a direct hit would've had Afif
Starc to Afif, 1 wide Wade saves five wides with a full-length dive to his right. This was a full toss that perhaps slipped out of his hand, way down leg
Starc to Afif, 1 bye beaten as he looks to take on the short ball
Starc to Shamim Hossain, 2 runs right into the blockhole, squeezed down to long-on
Starc to Shamim Hossain, 2 runs skiddy bouncer, excellent delivery. Looks to back away and pull but top-edges it over the keeper's head
Starc to Shamim Hossain, OUT knocked him over! Full, fast, furious, late tail in and hits the base of leg-stump. Too quick for Shamim
Tye to Afif, 1 run lofted over the infield to deep cover
Tye to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run slower ball angling in, looks to turn it to the leg side but gets a leading edge that rolls to short third
Tye to Afif, 1 run squirts this yorker-length delivery to backward point
Tye to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run slower length ball, tucked into the leg side
Tye to Afif, 1 run dabs it gently into the off side as they get through
Tye to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run heaved across the line to deep square
Starc to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs squeezed to point, excellent half-stop there to save a couple of runs
Starc to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run drilled to deep cover
Starc to Afif, FOUR runs improvises superbly! Full on middle, he reverse scoops it wide of the keeper. Excellent pick up
Starc to Afif, 1 wide comes up with a follow-up bouncer that beats the batter as he tries to back away and ramp

Starc to Afif, (no ball) bowled off a no-ball! Above the waist, the batter tried to bunt it behind the wicket but chopped on. Went across for a single. Starc switched off thinking it was going to be called a no-ball, the batters saw an opportunity to pinch a second and ran across. Starc misses the direct hit at the bowler's end to effect a run out. But the two runs are not given since the ball
Starc to Afif, 1 run flicked straight to deep midwicket but they have enough time to scamper back for the second
Starc to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run squirts this leading edge into the cover region
Starc to Afif, OUT hits bulls eye! Yorker-length, late reverse in to beat the inside edge as Afif looks to slog this into the stands.

7.45pm Bangladesh have huffed and puffed their way to a score they'd be disappointed with. Shakib held the innings together but couldn't kick on. Bangladesh needed someone to kick the innings into overdrive but couldn't find anyone to do the finisher's job. The spoils were equally shared by the five Australian bowlers. Starc, Hazlewood and Zampa were particularly impressive.

Welcome back to the chase. Australia favourites to take the 1-0 lead, unless the spinners make a web around them and the two left-arm seamers can make some impact up front. Alex Carey and Josh Philippe are out there. We'll start with offspin, however, here's Mahedi Hasan.
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run full on middle. Over the stumps this time. Tapped to the leg side for a single
Mahedi Hasan to Philippe, 1 run length ball on middle and leg. Walks across and flicks to deep midwicket
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, no run good length, on off stump. Tapped with soft hands to midwicket
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, no run good length, just outside off. Skidding through and fended back to Mahedi
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, no run fuller. On middle, and turning into leg. Flicked to square leg
Nasum to Philippe, no run good length on off from around the stumps. Angling in. Pushed to mid on
Nasum to Philippe, SIX runs good length, on off. Rocks back deep and pulls over deep midwicket for six! Picked the length early, and swatted for half a dozen
Nasum to Philippe, 2 runs good length, on off stump. Flicked to deep backward square

Nasum to Philippe, OUT Caught or stumped? Either way, he's outta here! Tossed up, wide outside off and Philippe comes down the wicket and goes for an inside out cover drive. Turns away sharply, but Philippe is way outside his crease as he misses the shot. Through to Nurul, who whips the bails off, and Philippe isn't even waiting for the decision. Replays say that's not caught, but stumped.
Nasum to Henriques, 1 run full on middle and leg. Flicked to midwicket for a single
Nasum to Marsh, no run full on leg, and worked to midwicket off the front foot
Shakib to Wade, no run over the stumps. Full on middle, and nudged off his toes to the leg side
Shakib to Wade, no run full just outside off. Tries to reverse sweep, hits the bat, and onto his pads
Shakib to Wade, 1 wide good length, on middle and leg. Turning further down the leg side. Wide given
Shakib to Wade, no run full outside off stump. And the drive is inside edged into his boots
Shakib to Wade, no run full outside off, and pushed to mid off
Shakib to Wade, 1 run full on off and nudged to mid on
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, no run full on middle from around the stumps. Defended to the off side
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, 2 runs good length on middle and skidding into leg. Whipped off his hips to deep midwicket for a couple
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, no run full on middle. PResses forward to defend
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, 1 run full outside off and caressed down the ground to long off for a single
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, FOUR runs overpitched, outside off. Slashes at it, and gets something on the ball. Races away to the vacant third man region for four
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run good length, on middle. Punched down the ground
Shakib to Marsh, no run fullish on off, and he gets on the back foot. Cuts it late, gets it to point
Shakib to Marsh, no run good length, outside off, and cut square to point again.
Shakib to Marsh, FOUR runs short and wide. Slapped through the off side to the point boundary for a much needed four
Shakib to Marsh, no run full, slower through the air, on off. Fended to cover
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run full on middle, and flicked to square leg. Early call for one, comfortably done
Shakib to Wade, no run good length, just outside off. Nudged back towards the non-striker, and Shakib runs across to intercept
Mustafizur to Marsh, no run good length outside off and angling further away. Tries to drive uppishly but no contact
Mustafizur to Marsh, no run good length, just outside leg stump. Looks to swipe a shot behind square to fine leg, but misses. Hits the pad and the keeper gets behind it
Mustafizur to Marsh, 1 run full on middle and off. Nudged to midwicket for a single
Mustafizur to Wade, no run good length, on off. Tries to pull, but mistimed back to Fizz
Mustafizur to Wade, 1 run good length, just outside off. Tries to play through the off side but the cutter jags in. Inside edge off the handle to the leg side
Mustafizur to Marsh, no run fullish, outside off. The cutter angles across, goes past the bat's edge, to the keeper
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, 1 run good length from around the stumps. Lands on off and skids through. Skips to the leg side and punches through the off side
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 2 runs good length, outside off. Punched to extra cover for two
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, no run good length, outside off stump. Cut square to point
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run good length, just outside off stump. Cut to deep point again for one
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, 1 run full, just outside off stump. Gets low, and paddles it down to fine leg for one
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run good length, just outside off and punched to wide long off for one
Shoriful Islam to Marsh, FOUR runs full outside off, and in the slot. Clatters a drive and the pace is used magnificently to get four through the covers
Shoriful Islam to Marsh, no run full on middle. Wants to fend it to the on side but it goes to the off side instead
Shoriful Islam to Marsh, 1 run full on middle and leg stump. Pushed to mid off, and off they go for a quick single
Shoriful Islam to Wade, 1 run good length ball, wider outside off. Cut to the off side

Shoriful Islam to Marsh, 1 leg bye back of a length, on middle. Misses the pull, hits his body and rolls away to the off side. They scamper across for a dangerous single, and Wade has to put in a dive, just in case
Shoriful Islam to Wade, 1 run
Mahmudullah to Wade, no run full, just outside off. Tries to paddle sweep. Misses, hits the pad, but missing off stump
Mahmudullah to Wade, 2 runs good length, just outside off stump. Punched uppishly past the fielder at cover! Bit of a dangerous shot, but just wide of the fielder

Mahmudullah to Wade, 1 run smart keeping! Good length, on middle and leg. Tries to paddle sweep, hits the edge and pops up straight back. But the keeper was going down the leg side for the paddle sweep, and the edge forces him to stick his left hand out to stop a four. Parried away
Mahmudullah to Marsh, 1 run good length, just outside off stump. Tries to punch, and it takes an edge over Mahmudullah!
Mahmudullah to Wade, 1 run full, on off stump. Swept to fine leg for a single
Mahmudullah to Marsh, 1 run full on off stump, and driven to long on
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run around the stumps, and the left-arm spinner's full ball is paddled to fine leg for one
Nasum to Wade, no run good length, on leg and angling across. Flicked to square leg
Nasum to Wade, no run good length on leg, and reverse paddled to short third man
Nasum to Agar, 1 wide good length ball outside leg stump. Skidding through, past his leg stump
Nasum to Agar, 1 run over the stumps. Good length on off, and turning into him. Worked off the hips to short fine leg
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run full and wide outside off. Slapped to deep point
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run rocks back and crashes this to deep point, good work in the deep
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, 1 run driven inside-out to sweeper cover
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 3 wide sharp turn, beats everyone! This one races past short fine too
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, no run beaten by one that skids through as Marsh was looking to late cut
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run mistimes this slog sweep to deep midwicket
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, no run driven firmly but straight to the skipper at cover
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, no run pushed into the off side
Shakib to Marsh, FOUR runs too much flight and he's absolutely hammered this straight back to almost take the umpire with it. Bullet hit down the ground
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run squeezes the drive to long-off
Shakib to Agar, 1 run works it from outside off to long-on
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run driven down to sweeper cover as they jog the single
Shakib to Agar, 2 runs shapes to cut but gets a thick outside edge that runs past short third. Good chase by Soumya
Shakib to Agar, no run deceived in flight as he lunges forward, gets an inside edge onto the pad
Mustafizur to Marsh, 1 run slower and fuller on the stumps, taps it into the off side for a quick single
Mustafizur to Agar, no run off-cutter outside off, dabs to short third. No pace to work with
Mustafizur to Agar, 1 run makes room and cuts hard, runs off a thick outside edge to square third man
Mustafizur to Marsh, no run slower one into the wicket, stops on the batter as he defends
Mustafizur to Marsh, 1 run lofted but not in control, lands between three off-side fielders
Mustafizur to Agar, 1 run heaved across the line, straight to deep midwicket
Nasum to Agar, no run quicker one on off, steered to short third
Nasum to Turner, no run drifts in and rips away to beat the batter's feeble jab at that
Nasum to Turner, 1 run off a thick edge past short third
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run forced through the covers
Nasum to Turner, no run beaten by a superb skidder. Looked to ease it behind point but the ball just fizzed through
Shakib to Marsh, SIX runs how far has that gone? Enough! Long-off was in business for a split-second but stood no chance. Lovely hit from Marsh, hitting with the spin.
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run drilled to cover, a half-stop will give them a single

Shakib to Turner, 1 leg bye huge lbw shout as Turner goes across a long way to sweep. Not given and Bangladesh review. Hit on the back leg but the ball spun away after pitching and may have just missed off stump. Good decision in the end, but not a bad referral by any means.
Shakib to Marsh, no run quicker and fuller, defended back
Shakib to Marsh, no run beaten as he shapes to cut this full delivery
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run on the pads, turned towards deep midwicket
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run clobbered across the line to deep midwicket
Nasum to Turner, 1 run smeared to sweeper cover
Nasum to Turner, 1 run squirted off a thick inside edge towards deep midwicket
Nasum to Starc, 1 run eased down to long-off

Nasum to Turner, no run have they got him? Superb work behind the stumps as Nasum gets this to spin across the face of the bat to beat Turner. Did he drag his back foot inside the crease? Looks like he just made it in time. Good work from Nurul nonetheless
Shoriful Islam to Starc, no run slower length ball outside off, can't hit it past cover
Shoriful Islam to Starc, FOUR runs takes him on with the hook, and it flies off the top-edge, one bounce to the fine leg boundary
Shoriful Islam to Starc, no run beaten as he backs away to scythe that over the infield
Shoriful Islam to Starc, 1 run mistimes the heave to deep midwicket
Shoriful Islam to Turner, 1 run gently tucks it into the leg side for a quick single

Shoriful Islam to Starc, 3 runs the short fine leg fielder makes a right royal mess as he fails to account for the ball spinning sway, Shakib comes around to mop up. Starc didn't get pace on the ball to work with
Mustafizur to Starc, 1 run heaved into the leg side to deep midwicket
Mustafizur to Turner, FOUR runs drilled down the ground to beat long-off. This was right in the slot, Turner held his shape and went hard at it
Mustafizur to Starc, 1 run slaps this to long-off
Mustafizur to Tye, no run beaten by another cutter as he tries to swing this across the line
Mustafizur to Tye, no run another swing and a miss
Shoriful Islam to Starc, 1 run pushed to the man at the edge of the ring at cover
Shoriful Islam to Starc, 1 wide beaten as he tries to wait, wait, wait and then drill this slower ball over the infield. Way outside his hitting range
Shoriful Islam to Starc, 1 run hit hard to long-off
Shoriful Islam to Zampa, no run beaten by this cutter off a length, played too early
Shoriful Islam to Starc, no run defends this slower delivery back. Slightly uppish but doesn't carry
Mustafizur to Hazlewood, no run beaten by a cutter that spins back in to keep low and beat the inside edge
Mustafizur to Hazlewood, 1 wide sprays this outside the wide line as he attempts another slower ball
Mustafizur to Hazlewood, 1 run driven straight to cover
Mustafizur to Starc, no run another slower length ball outside off, beaten again
Mustafizur to Starc, 1 run hits this full toss straight to deep cover
Mustafizur to Hazlewood, 1 run backs away and toe-ends a hit to cover
Australia never looked in control of this chase at any point, not even when Mitch Marsh appeared to be revving up. You always got a sense that he was one mishit away.

9.35pm Bangladesh have walked home in style! They'd have been the first ones to admit to being at least 20 short but boy, have they not made 132 look 172? Incredible effort. Australia choked against spin and Bangladesh's plethora of slow deliveries on what was a challenging surface.
Nasum Ahmed is the Player of the Match for his 4 for 19
Time for the presentation

That's that for today. Sreshth's bulletin will be up very soon, so do check it out if you haven't been able to watch much of the game. Join us for the 2nd T20I on Wednesday. Until then, it's goodbye from my Shashank Kishore, and my colleagues, Sreshth Shah and Binoy George. Adios!
Bangladesh won by 23 runs
